Class BaseRs

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.rexsl.page.Resource
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    @Inset.Default(value=com.rexsl.page.inset.LinksInset.class)
@Loggable(value=1)
public class BaseRs
extends com.rexsl.page.BaseResource
    Abstract RESTful resource.

    The class is mutable and NOT thread-safe.
